cab.content: tag DOCUMENT IB THE PROPERTY OF H S BRITAflHIG MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)SECRET.G.T.7627.r WAR CABINET. -CONTINUANCE OF EMERGENCY LEGISLATION. (Defence of the ^oal*m R^ulaiTon 14.a.)The following copy of a letter from the Admiralty is circulated for information,(Signed) T. Jones,Acting Secretary, War Cabinet,5th July, 1919.ADMIRALTY. S.W.2nd July 1919Dear Mr. Kemp.I do not know whether you are still responsible for tho Expiring Laws Continuance Bill but I write to say that we are now prepared to agree to the repeal cf Defence of the Realm Regula-tion No 14.a.Yours sincerely,(Signed) W.J. Evans.J* . Kemp, Esq., Home Committee, War Cabinet.2, Whitehall Gardens.S.W.I.
